g.text: Network Architecture of the Seven Kingdoms
"Winter is Coming... and So Are the Packets"
Internet Security Barrier ‚Ä¢ DDoS Protection ‚Ä¢ SSL Termination
"What is dead may never die, but rises again, harder and stronger"
"Power resides where men believe it resides"
The Night's Watch ‚Ä¢ Netmaker LXC Fortress
"The night is dark and full of packets"
"Winter is coming... and so is IPv6"
"A Lannister always pays his debts... and routes his packets"

svg.text: "When you play the game of networks, you win or you disconnect."
‚Äî Maester Proxmox, First of His Name, King of the Seven VLANs
